io.sphere.sdk.search.model

Interface FacetAndFilterSearchModel<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - type of the resource
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    RangeTermFacetAndFilterSearchModel, TermFacetAndFilterSearchModel

    public interface FacetAndFilterSearchModel<T>
    Model to build facets and filters.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TermFacetAndFilterExpression<T> allTerms()
      Generates an expression to select all elements, without filtering, along with the facet for all terms for this attribute.
      TermFacetAndFilterExpression<T> by(java.lang.String value)
      Generates an expression to select all elements with the given attribute value, along with the facet for all terms for this attribute.
      TermFacetAndFilterExpression<T> byAll(java.lang.Iterable<java.lang.String> values)
      Generates an expression to select all elements with attributes matching all the given values, along with the facet for all terms for this attribute.
      TermFacetAndFilterExpression<T> byAny(java.lang.Iterable<java.lang.String> values)
      Generates an expression to select all elements with attributes matching any of the given values, along with the facet for all terms for this attribute.

    • Method Detail

      • allTerms

        TermFacetAndFilterExpression<T> allTerms()
        Generates an expression to select all elements, without filtering, along with the facet for all terms for this attribute.
        Returns:
        a bundle of an empty filter expression and a facet expression for all terms

      • by

        TermFacetAndFilterExpression<T> by(java.lang.String value)
        Generates an expression to select all elements with the given attribute value, along with the facet for all terms for this attribute. For example: filtering by "red" color would select only those elements with "red" value, while the color facet would contain all possible values.
        Parameters:
        value - the value to filter by
        Returns:
        a bundle of the filter expressions for the given value and a facet expression for all terms

      • byAny

        TermFacetAndFilterExpression<T> byAny(java.lang.Iterable<java.lang.String> values)
        Generates an expression to select all elements with attributes matching any of the given values, along with the facet for all terms for this attribute. For example: filtering by ["red", "blue"] color would select only those elements with either "red" or "blue" value, while the color facet would contain all possible values.
        Parameters:
        values - the values to filter by
        Returns:
        a bundle of the filter expressions for the given values and a facet expression for all terms

      • byAll

        TermFacetAndFilterExpression<T> byAll(java.lang.Iterable<java.lang.String> values)
        Generates an expression to select all elements with attributes matching all the given values, along with the facet for all terms for this attribute. For example: filtering by ["red", "blue"] color would select only those elements with both "red" and "blue" values, while the color facet would contain all possible values.
        Parameters:
        values - the values to filter by
        Returns:
        a bundle of the filter expressions for the given values and a facet expression for all terms
